title: PTMVision Data Storage Schema
description: Storage of post-translational modification data with respect to one single protein.

proteins.description: Single protein entries for which PTM data is stored in this file.

pdb_structure.description: The brotli encoded PDB string of a protein structure of this entry.

^[0-9]+$.description: Each key represents one position with modifications of the stored protein entry.

modification_unimod_name.description: The UNIMOD name of this modification.

modification_unimod_id.description: The UNIMOD id of this modification.

modification_classification.description: The classification name of this modification.

meta_data.description: Generalized meta data for classifications and annotations for all stored protein entries.

modification_classifications.description: List of modification classifications that occur across all stored protein entries.

^.+$.description: The key of this object names the resp. modification classification.

color.description: Color to use for vis. of this modification classifcation.

description.description: Description to use for this modification classifcation.

distance_cutoff.description: The distance cutoff in Angstrom to determine residues in contact.

name.description: The internal name to use for this custom modification annotation (e.g. polar).

^custom_annotation_[A-Za-z0-9]+$.description: Any custom annotation object (for modified positions).

name.description: The internal name to use for this custom annotation.

color.description: Color to use for vis. of this custom annotation.

description.description: Description to use for this custom annotation.
